abstract: From Media Decoder: The Weinstein brothers have failed to complete a deal in excess of $600 million to reacquire Miramax Films from the Walt Disney Company in 2005, according to sources.
snippet: From Media Decoder: The Weinstein brothers have failed to complete a deal in excess of $600 million to reacquire Miramax Films from the Walt Disney Company in 2005, according to sources.
lead_paragraph: From Brooks Barnes at Media Decoder:

headline.main: Weinsteins’ Bid for Miramax Falls Short
